SHANNON PIESINGER
shannon.piesinger@gmail.com

Frog Town is based on the classic 1981 arcade game Frogger. I wrote it in JavaScript utilizing HTML5's Canvas graphics environment. The objective is to safely navigate the frog across the road and the river, and safely land it in one of the 5 "homes" at the top of the screen. Along the way, avoid the road traffic and jump on the floating logs and turtles to get across the river. Use the arrow keys to move the frog. Enjoy!
